data.caption: Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half-Year Ended 30Th September, 2023.
data.news_body: The Board in its meeting held today, i.e. 19th October, 2023 approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting - Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2023
data.news_body: The Board, in its meeting held today i.e. 14th August, 2023, approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2023
data.news_body: Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023 along with Limited review on the results

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Annual Financial Results, Dividend And Related Matters
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 5th May, 2023, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company (the Board) at the meeting held today i.e., 18th May, 2023:-

(i) Audited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2023;

(ii) Audited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2023;

(iii) Audited Balance Sheet, both Standalone and Consolidated, as at 31st March, 2023;

(iv) Audited Cash Flow Statement, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2023; and

(v) Reports from the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Audited Annual Financial Results, Dividend And Related Matters
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 5th May, 2023, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company (the Board) at the meeting held today i.e., 18th May, 2023:-

(i) Audited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2023;

(ii) Audited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2023;

(iii) Audited Balance Sheet, both Standalone and Consolidated, as at 31st March, 2023;

(iv) Audited Cash Flow Statement, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2023; and

(v) Reports from the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2022 And Interim Dividend
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 20th January, 2023, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e. 3rd February, 2023:

(i) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2022; and

(ii) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors on the aforesaid Financial Results.

The Board at the said meeting also -

(a) declared Interim Dividend of Rs. 6/- per Ordinary Share of Re. 1/- each for the financial year ending on 31st March, 2023; such Dividend will be paid between Friday, 3rd March, 2023 and Sunday, 5th March, 2023 to those Members entitled thereto.

(b) fixed Wednesday, 15th February, 2023 as the Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2022 And Interim Dividend
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 20th January, 2023, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e. 3rd February, 2023:

(i) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2022; and

(ii) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors on the aforesaid Financial Results.

The Board at the said meeting also -

(a) declared Interim Dividend of Rs. 6/- per Ordinary Share of Re. 1/- each for the financial year ending on 31st March, 2023; such Dividend will be paid between Friday, 3rd March, 2023 and Sunday, 5th March, 2023 to those Members entitled thereto.

(b) fixed Wednesday, 15th February, 2023 as the Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: We write to advise, pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, that the Company's representatives virtually attended the ESG Conference organised by CLSA India Private Limited on 2nd December, 2022, and made a presentation at the said Conference. A copy of the presentation made is enclosed.

data.caption: Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: We enclose, in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and  Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the disclosure of Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended 30th September, 2022, in the required format.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Six Months Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 6th October, 2022, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company (the Board) at the meeting held today, i.e. 20th October, 2022:

(i) Unaudited Financial Results of the Company;
(ii) Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company;
(iii) Unaudited Cash Flow Statement for the half year ended 30th September, 2022;
(iv) Unaudited Balance Sheet as at 30th September, 2022; and
(v) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors, Messrs. S R B C & CO LLP, Chartered Accountants, on the aforesaid Financial Results.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2022
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 22nd July, 2022, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e. 1st August, 2022:-

(i) Unaudited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2022;

(ii) Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2022;

(iii) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors, Messrs. S R B C & CO LLP, Chartered Accountants, on the aforesaid Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results.

data.caption: Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: We enclose, in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the disclosure of Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended 31st March, 2022, in the required format.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 20th January, 2022, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e. 3rd February, 2022:

(i) Unaudited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2021;

(ii) Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2021;

(iii) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors, Messrs. S R B C & CO LLP, on the aforesaid Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results.

data.caption: Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: We enclose, in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Statement on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended 30th September, 2021, on a consolidated basis, in the required format.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Six Months Ended 30Th September, 2021
data.news_body:
We enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e. 27th October, 2021:

(i) Unaudited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Six Months ended 30th September, 2021;

(ii) Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Six Months ended 30th September, 2021;

(iii) Unaudited Cash Flow Statement, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Six Months ended 30th September, 2021;

(iv) Unaudited Balance Sheet, both Standalone and Consolidated, as at 30th September, 2021; and

(v) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors, Messrs. S R B C & CO LLP, on the aforesaid Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results.

The meeting commenced at 5.35 p.m. and concluded at 8.05 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 10th July, 2021, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e. 24th July, 2021:

(i) Unaudited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2021;

(ii) Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2021; and

(iii) Limited Review Reports from the Statutory Auditors, Messrs. S R B C & CO LLP, on the aforesaid Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results.

The meeting commenced at 5.20 p.m. and concluded at 7.35 p.m.

data.caption: Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: We enclose, in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, statement on related party transactions of the Company for the half year ended 31st March, 2021, in the required format.

data.caption: Auditors'' Reports
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 1st June, 2021, enclosed please find the Reports from the Statutory Auditors of the Company, Messrs. S R B C & CO LLP, Chartered Accountants, on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2021.

The Auditors have issued the said Reports with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results And Other Matters
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 18th May, 2021, we enclose, in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the following, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company (the Board) at the meeting held today i.e., 1st June, 2021:-

(i) Audited Financial Results of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2021;

(ii) Audited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the Quarter and Twelve Months ended 31st March, 2021;

(iii) Audited Balance Sheet, both Standalone and Consolidated, as at 31st March, 2021;

and other documents.
